name: ResetUserSessions
description:
Reset all active Miro sessions for a specific user.

This tool is used to immediately end all active Miro sessions for a specified user across all devices, requiring them to sign in again. It's useful for security reasons, such as when credentials are compromised or there's suspicious activity. This API is enterprise-only and requires admin privileges.

parameters.name: user_email_for_session_reset
parameters.description: Email ID of the user whose sessions need resetting. This will sign the user out from all devices.

value_schema.description: Email ID of the user whose sessions you want to reset. Note that this user will be signed out from all devices.
